paper_data.title: Emerging Therapies in Multi-Drug Resistant Tuberculosis

email_content:
Subject: Request for Preprint Manuscript: Emerging Therapies in Multi-Drug Resistant Tuberculosis

Dear C Loiseau,

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Dr. Systematic Researcher and I am a researcher at Regional Medical Research Institute. I am currently conducting a systematic review in Tuberculosis Research and encountered your excellent publication:

"Emerging Therapies in Multi-Drug Resistant Tuberculosis"
DOI: 10.1093/infdis/jiz123

I was unfortunately unable to access the full manuscript through traditional channels. Would you be willing to share a preprint version or reprint if available? This would greatly assist our research efforts and help ensure our review is as comprehensive as possible.

I completely understand if you are unable to share the manuscript, and I respect your publishing agreements. If appropriate, I would also welcome any thoughts you might have on related works or ongoing research in this area.

Thank you very much for your time and consideration. I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Dr. Systematic Researcher
Institution: Regional Medical Research Institute
Email: research@university.edu
Research Field: Tuberculosis Research

paper_data.title: Gut Microbiome and Treatment Response in MDR-TB

email_content:
Subject: Request for Preprint Manuscript: Gut Microbiome and Treatment Response in MDR-TB

Dear Research Author,

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Dr. Systematic Researcher and I am a researcher at Regional Medical Research Institute. I am currently conducting a systematic review in Microbiome Medicine and encountered your excellent publication:

"Gut Microbiome and Treatment Response in MDR-TB"
DOI: 10.1056/NEJMoa1800654

I was unfortunately unable to access the full manuscript through traditional channels. Would you be willing to share a preprint version or reprint if available? This would greatly assist our research efforts and help ensure our review is as comprehensive as possible.

I completely understand if you are unable to share the manuscript, and I respect your publishing agreements. If appropriate, I would also welcome any thoughts you might have on related works or ongoing research in this area.

Thank you very much for your time and consideration. I look forward to your response.

Dr. Systematic Researcher
